long_description: The lightweight, versatile eGear EQ2 Headlamp easily converts from an LED headlamp to a clip light. Comfortable strap lets you wear the eGear eQ2 as a headlamp-or clip it on your pants, pack and anywhere else. Single LED bulb runs on 2 CR2032 lithium coin batteries (included). Features 2 modes of operation: Steady on provides 8 hrs. of light; flash mode provides 16 hrs. of light. Magnifier lens on the eGear EQ2 Headlamp creates a focused beam, outputting 22 lumens of light with a beam distance of 23 yds. Lightweight plastic case is water- and impact-resistant. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight, versatile eGear EQ2 Headlamp easily converts from an LED headlamp to a clip light.
